welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pike Creek Valley, a charming town known for its scenic beauty and friendly community. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport is where all commercial flights arrive and depart from.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport is for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.
